thread.section_title: White Mountain Puzzles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of White Mountain Puzzles | whitemountainpuzzles.com
thread.title: Jeanette
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Jeanette

author: Jeanette
title: Jeanette
text: I love White Mountain puzzles. Staff are very professional and courteous. I received a puzzle a while back with a missing piece and with no questions another was shipped out to me at no charge. Recently there was a problem with my on-line order and staff immediately resolved the issue and puzzles were received within days. I only wish you didn't have to spend so much for free shipping!
